Html:
Hi,

When i use an excel created by phpexcel i can't format cells with this buttons:

I have an error that say: "Style 'Percent' not found" if i use percent button, same error with "000" button.

I can't understand why, i try any type of write method, both excel5 and excel2007. I still have the error although i only have a script that create and save a file, without write in a cell.

Thank you and sorry for my bad english ^^
